test.name: Test de création de produit

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Vérifier la page de connexion
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//android.widget.EditText[@hint="Mot de passe"]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.
Vérifie que la page de connexion est affichée

kw.name: Saisir les identifiants
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'johnd' into text field '//android.widget.EditText[@hint="Nom d'utilisateur"]'
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Typing password into text field '//android.widget.EditText[@hint="Mot de passe"]'
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.
Saisit le nom d'utilisateur et le mot de passe

kw.name: Cliquer sur le bouton de connexion
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.
